messages.subject: Anyone ever hear of Plurk?
messages.msgSnippet: I found something that I found fun & maybe a little addicting & I d love to see some unschoolers on there:
messages.messageBody:
I found something that I found fun & maybe a little addicting
& I'd love to see some unschoolers on there:
http://plurk.com/redeemByURL?from_uid=40033&check=1968392133&s=1

It seems like it's a cross between IM and a message board... took me a little getting used to (like learning how to find the unread messages)..

Right now I've only found 4 matches for homeschool and no matches for
unschool/ing on there...would love to see more.. I found Plurk through a popular knitter, Wendy (of wendyknits.net)...people talk about all sorts of things, from weather/deep fried pepsi, etc...

I figure it might be fun for kids as well..

Cheers,
Jessica
